pullRequest.title: Updated the Registry REST API in Apicurio Studio and regenerated JAX-RS layer
pullRequest.bodyText: The REST changes for the artifact-state feature was updated to be a little bit more consistent.  The rest of the changes cascade from that.

commit.message: Updates to the API to allow state changes.
[Apicurio] Regen JAX-RS with additional PROTOBUF_FD option in ArtifactType

Merge pull request #1 from EricWittmann/_apicurio-8083

[Apicurio] Please merge generated API project
[Apicurio] Regen JAX-RS with support for state changes.

Merge pull request #2 from EricWittmann/_apicurio-2261

[Apicurio] Please merge generated API project
merge with master and fix resulting issues

nodes.bodyText: @EricWittmann there are two ArtifactState classes ... one is redundant ...
